Cobble mites that remain a cohesive swarm for many years become dangerous living landslides. **[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Sturzstromer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1100) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 52 **Perception** +33; no vision, [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (precise) 120 feet **Languages** [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +37, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35 **Str** +8 **Dex** +10 **Con** +8 **Int** -1 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +2 **Clutching Stones** The sturzstromer's space is greater difficult terrain.
**Tremorsense** A sturzstromer's tremorsense is a precise sense out to 120 feet and an imprecise sense out to 240 feet. A sturzstromer can't sense anything beyond the range of its tremorsense --- **AC** 41 **Fort** +33 **Ref** +35 **Will** +29 **HP** 280 **Immunities** precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) **Resistances** piercing 20, slashing 20 **Weaknesses** area damage 12, splash damage 12 --- **Speed** 50 feet, burrow 20 feet **Primal Innate Spells** DC 41 - **8th** [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94) (at will), [Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) (×3), [Stone Tell](/Spells.aspx?ID=310) - **10th** [Earthquake](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) **Grasping Bites** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) The sturzstromer attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check and compares the result to the Fortitude DC of each creature in its space. This counts as two attacks for the sturzstromer's multiple attack penalty.
**Critical Success** The creature falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31), takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage, and is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) by the sturzstromer until the end of the sturzstromer's next turn.
**Success** The creature falls prone and is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) by the sturzstromer until the end of the sturzstromer's next turn **Landslide** **Requirements** The sturzstromer's most recent action was to cast [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95); **Effect** The sturzstromer closes a fissure it made, choosing one creature that fell in. That creature must succeed at a DC 41 Reflex save or be [buried as in an avalanche](/Rules.aspx?ID=646). **Pummeling Assault** Each foe in the sturzstromer's space takes 4d10 bludgeoning damage (DC 41 basic Reflex save).
